name: BENTO GIRL
description:
This is a synthetic casual game of [beautiful girl] + [blind box] + [delicious bento]
Players can obtain blind boxes by synthesizing exquisite bento, and unlock the popular beautiful girl chef!

Game features:
1. Exquisite 35 kinds of bento, suitable for all kinds of gourmet tastes
2. 12 blind boxes
3. 12 gourmet girl chefs
4. The game unlocks new bento by synthesizing the same bento
5. A casual game of collecting blind boxes and discovering new food!
